page.title: 03EMPLOYMENT
page.content: Part of {PRESCOT }lies in our block. The former boys'and girls' grammar schools have combined to form a comprehensive school called {PRESCOT {HIGH.}The {GAS WORKS }with its gas holder also can be found just inside the boundary.{PRESCOT }itself has a long history.It has a church supposedly haunted by a ghost;it is famous for its watch and clock industry which has now gone but there is a fine museum;in the last century a cable and wire manufacturing industry has been established called { {BRITISH INSULATED CALLENDER'S CABLES or BICC for short;and a firm called {TINNLING'S }used to publish books here.{PRESCOT }is part of the { {METRO.COUNTY of MERSEYSIDE }and as you would expect in these time there is a great deal of unemployment.
